mapper.insert: INSERT INTO weeklyranking (author, board, likes, postCount, commentCount, rankingType, weekOf) VALUES (#{author}, #{board}, #{likes}, #{postCount}, #{commentCount}, #{rankType}, #{weekOf})
mapper.select: SELECT wr.id AS id, wr.author, wr.board, wr.likes FROM weeklyranking wr WHERE wr.rankingType = 'popularPost' AND wr.weekOf = #{weekOf} ORDER BY wr.likes DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT wr.author, wr.postCount, wr.commentCount FROM weeklyranking wr WHERE wr.rankingType = 'userActivity' AND wr.weekOf = #{weekOf} ORDER BY wr.postCount DESC, wr.commentCount DESC LIMIT 10
